short_desc: All of the information shown for arrested/in-custody persons represents the most recent information known to the Alameda County Sheriff's Office
description: All of the information shown for arrested/in-custody persons represents the most recent information known to the Alameda County Sheriff's Office.  As individuals move through the judicial process, information may change. Can also call Santa Rita directly to obtain inmate information, 925-551-6500. Names of individuals arrested and booked by Alameda County agencies, in certain circumstances, may not appear on this site based on exemptions provided under Government Code section 6254(f).  In the event a name does not appear on this site, please contact the local jurisdiction for information.
